state: Welcome to another profound round of TextWorld! First stop, travel east. Okay, and then, travel north. And then, go north. Once you accomplish that, make an effort to go west. And then, attempt to venture north. With that done, attempt to go east. Following that, go to the south. Then, venture west. If you can do that, venture south. And then, go south. That done, attempt to head east. Following that, go south. And then, move east. Then, head south. And then, lift the coin from the floor of the spare room. That's it! -= Canteen =- You're now in the canteen. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Canteen =-0/1
